title: NYDJ Women's Petite Sheri Jean
description: SLIM JEANS FOR WOMEN: Prepare yourself for more than a few admiring stares. NYDJ's Sheri Slim Jeans in Petite are an expertly cut fit that's always in season with great styling and a silhouette that you’ll love.

EXCLUSIVE LIFT TUCK TECHNOLOGY: This unique technology uses a proprietary slimming panel with a patented criss-cross design to shape and support your curves for an always-sleek silhouette. It will lift, slim, and flatten in the front for a flattering fit.

MEASUREMENTS: Inseam runs 28 inches, high rise is 9.5 inches, with a slim leg opening of 13.5 inches. Due to the Lift Tuck Technology, select one size down from what you normally wear for the best fit.

CLASSIC DESIGN: Finished with five-pocket styling, a zip fly, and a button closure, these slim jeans for women are timeless and versatile, so you can wear them with all your tops from season to season.
EASY TO CLEAN: Keep your slimming jeans in their best condition by machine washing in cold water and line drying. 72% Cotton, 20% Lyocell, 5% Elastomultiester, 2% Elastane.

Prepare yourself for more than a few admiring stares. NYDJ’s Sheri Slim Jeans in Petite feature an expertly cut fit that’s always in season. These stretchy women's jeans have a timeless look with a modern fit. Enhance your assets and streamline your silhouette with our signature Lift Tuck Technology, which flattens and flatters using a proprietary slimming panel with a patented criss-cross design. Features classic five-pocket styling, zip fly, and button closure.MATERIAL:  72% Cotton, 20% Lyocell, 5% Elastomultiester, 2% Elastane.SIZING: Inseam: 28", Front Rise: 9.5", Leg Opening: 13.5". Select one size smaller for the perfect fit.NYDJ, formally known as Not Your Daughter's Jeans, creates jeans for every body: all shapes, all sizes, and all ages. Founded in 2003, NYDJ set out to design premium stretch jeans with a fabulous fit that makes every woman feel comfortable and confident—like her best self. All NYDJ jeans are made with Lift Tuck Technology, a proprietary slimming panel with a patented criss-cross design to flatten in the front and curve-contouring construction to flatter curves in the back. Headquartered in Los Angeles and inspired by California style and the latest denim trends, NYDJ is always working to bring you the most innovative denim technologies as well as the chicest non-denim pants and pair-perfect tops.
